Articles.Content: I re-textured the command pod and when I open KSP it\'s black.
Can you post the texture you used?

Are you sure you didn\'t save it as pdn?

Always save as png, multilayered projects must first be merged into a single layer, then saved as png.

Are you sure you didn\'t save it as pdn?

Always save as png, multilayered projects must first be merged into a single layer, then saved as png.

That might be why since I used paint.net

Are you sure you didn\'t save it as pdn?

Always save as png, multilayered projects must first be merged into a single layer, then saved as png.

Could you tell me how to do this? When tried it became white with a red swirl. Better than black but no what I\'m looking for.

Edit: NVM I figured it out. Thanks for your help. Now I need to know how to switch the pods?
